law.text: If a suit or action on a policy of insurance, duly commenced within the time limited by any valid clause of such policy for commencing suits or actions against the company, shall be enjoined or abated, suit or action may be commenced at any time within one year after the dissolution of such injunction or the abatement of such suit or action, to the same extent as if there were no limitation of time provided in the policy for the bringing of such suit or action.
